title: This is your personal QR Code
blurb: Make sure to have your QR code ready! You’ll need it to check in and access all the cool features of FronteraHacks. Keep it handy to speed up the process!

title: Join the Discord
blurb: Stay in the loop with all our latest updates, announcements, and event info! Join our Discord community to connect with fellow attendees and never miss a thing. Don’t miss out on the action!

title: Get Your Resume in Front of HEB
blurb: Submit your Resume before the event ends! HEB will be reviewing all the resumes we send their way, so make sure yours is up to date. Don’t miss this opportunity to showcase your skills and get noticed!

title: Share Memories on Instagram
blurb: Capture your favorite moments and share the fun with us on Instagram! Tag us at @fronterahacks and don’t forget to use the hashtags #fronterahacks, #fronterahacks24, and #fronteradevs to show off your experience! Let’s make some memories!
